text: 3.16 Lom 10.3, 1 Ko 15.51, 1 Te 4.15 Mɨj ne tɨkup okok mɨdupsek, tap anɨb okok nep agup. Nɨŋɨd apun, takaw ogɨnap ne tɨkup ak, takaw koslam nɨgep tek agup. Anɨgɨl agek, binɨb gos sɨkol sɨkol nɨŋɨd, Klays nop gos kɨles ma nepal okok, kɨli takaw anɨb ak tɨg adɨkɨl, monmon agñɨbal. Pen Pol takaw ne tɨkup ak nep anɨb ma gɨpal, God takaw kuŋay bɨ ogɨnap tɨkɨlak ak abe gɨpal. Anɨgel, God kɨlop gek, yul awl yɨbɨl dɨl kul gɨnɨgabal.
